title: So I've got a dollar...
body:
I want RP and I've got a dollar. I'll send you this precious dollar in exchange for some RP.  I don't have $5 on my paypal to purchase some or else I would.. :*(

I wanted a project {{champion:245}} (Ekko) skin, or any other Ekko skin to be honest, but a dollar isn't enough, so I'll be more than willing to save. :) Although.. if you wanna bless a lad, that'd be more than welcome.

replies.body: Dude hang on to that dollar, it has a lot of potential:  Mcnuggets, Slurpees, coffee, a coloring book.  If the RNG gods are in your favor, there's always a chance of finding the project skin shard through hextech crafting.  Stock up on mastery chests and keys, and with some luck you could find it.  I can't really offer much more than encouragement, but good luck.  :D
